double-hypens

And more! In the past, organizations would email documents to each other using heavyweight office applications. Then teams moved to proprietary web-based editors. But with GitHub's support for prose, you can store your development documents in your repositories and manage them with all the great tools--like pull requests, issues, and releases--that you use for your code.
